name: PaymentNotice
title: PaymentNotice
description: This resource provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.

elements.name: PaymentNotice
elements.description: This resource provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this payment notice.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: request
elements.description: Reference of resource for which payment is being made.

elements.name: response
elements.description: Reference of response to resource for which payment is being made.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date when this resource was created.

elements.name: provider
elements.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

elements.name: payment
elements.description: A reference to the payment which is the subject of this notice.

elements.name: paymentDate
elements.description: The date when the above payment action occurred.

elements.name: payee
elements.description: The party who will receive or has received payment that is the subject of this notification.

elements.name: recipient
elements.description: The party who is notified of the payment status.

elements.name: amount
elements.description: The amount sent to the payee.

elements.name: paymentStatus
elements.description: A code indicating whether payment has been sent or cleared.
